about_the_game:
Sushicat : Bento is a unique game blending roguelike deckbuilding with the tile-puzzle genre. Get ready to think strategically, take risks, and show good taste to rack up the highest score.


Place sushi tiles in strategic spots to create mouthwatering combos. Maximize your score by matching different proteins and sushi types while discovering new flavors to cook up your recipe for victory.


An adorable tile game that will leave you "purring" in thought.
New tiles and bonuses to delight your bento!


Use a variety of elements: unique room layouts, special tiles, and upgrades. Craft an epic bento box packed with flavors to score big and unlock even more upgrades.

[Animated banner]

  • Endless playground ! Broke the game with insane combos over the grid

  • Combos that carry over across grids

  • Special tiles, upgrades, and bonuses to spice up your matches!

Dive into the delicious and cute world of Sushicat. A cozy atmosphere awaits you, filled with purring sushicats and scrumptious delights.

  • Upgrade your bento and discover how to combine different proteins to score the most points.

  • Enjoy adorable visuals with hand-drawn illustrations.

  • 100% vegetarian.

[Animated banner]
Sushicat : Bento was lovingly crafted by a duo of game developers from Réunion Island. Together, we founded Titang Studio with the dream of creating plenty of original and high-quality indie games!

We’d love to hear your constructive feedback, so don’t hesitate to reach out. We’ll do our best to reply to your messages :3!

Bon appétit!
